WRITING.TITLE: Staniland, whose helmet reads "Little Miss Dangerous,"striked two vehicles waiting at a red light. When police arrived, they spotted drug paraphernalia, including a silver spoon, a syringe and drug residue. That's her 3rd arrest. Fired? Nope. Still a police officer.
